bmac.emailFormFieldLabel: Email used for your Bmac account

discordLink.title: Discord:
discordLink.failed: Failed to link Discord. Please try again later.

patreonLink.title: Patreon:
patreonLink.recommendation: We recommend linking accounts by logging in with Patreon. If this doesn't work, try connecting using the form below.
patreonLink.emailInputLabel: Email used for your Patreon account
patreonLink.codeSentSuccessMessage: Check the entered email inbox for the validation code
patreonLink.troubleshoot: Make sure you are a member of the <patreonLink>WalkScape Patreon</patreonLink> before linking accounts.

success.title: Successfully linked Patreon!
success.body: Access to the game is granted in waves. If a wave is ongoing, you can download the game immediately from your Account page. Otherwise we will notify you by email once access is granted. Please note that sometimes a refresh or relogin is required for information to update correctly on the Account page.

thankYou.title: Thank you for your support!
thankYou.body-1: Your new supporter status should be immediately visible on the account page, but may in some cases take around two hours to fully synchronize. In this case you will get an email when your status changes or you are accepted into the beta.
thankYou.body-2: If you don't get an email after a few hours, check that the email you've entered is the same one you used in Patreon or Buy me a Coffee, and relink it.

expiredModal.title: Your temporary access has expired
expiredModal.description: Thank you for participating in the WalkScape closed beta! Your limited time access has expired, but don't worry, you can still keep playing by:
expiredModal.apply: <betaApplicationLink>Applying for beta access</betaApplicationLink> and waiting for an invite
expiredModal.support: Supporting us on <patreonLink>Patreon</patreonLink> or <bmacLink>Buy Me a Coffee</bmacLink>. Supporters regain access immediately.

betaDownloadInfo.termsOfServiceDisclaimer: By clicking 'Accept' you agree to follow our <tos>Terms of Service</tos> and our Game Rules.

1.title: Real steps only
1.description: In WalkScape, steps are generated by walking with your legs. We strongly oppose any non-walking methods of generating steps and discourage promoting them in our community (Reddit, Portal, Discord). The only exceptions are situations, where the leg is naturally moving in ways that count as steps (such as cycling) and only as long as the counted step rate is low enough to not be abusable.

2.title: 1 device = 1 account = 1 person
2.description: We expect one player to play on one account on one device. Do not share your device or account with anyone else. Use of emulators or playing on multiple devices at the same time is not allowed. Do not have multiple instances of the game running on the same device.

3.title: Report exploits and misbehaviour
3.description: Do not share or encourage cheating or use of exploits with other players. If you find serious bugs or exploits in the game, report them to the team through official reporting channels or by pinging a team member directly.

4.title: Official distributions only
4.description: Only play versions distributed through official channels. Do not try to create your own bundles, builds or distributions of the game, or download or share unofficial builds distributed by someone else.

5.title: Play nice :)
5.description: WalkScape is a social game, played in a virtual world, but with real people. We expect all Walkers to treat each other with respect, whether it be in the game, on our social media or in real life. All forms of harassment and discrimination are absolutely prohibited.

android.title: For Android users:
android.instructions: You are using Android. There are two steps to get access to the Beta version of WalkScape:
android.downloadFromGooglePlay: After you have joined the group, you have access to <playStoreLink>download the game from Google Play</playStoreLink>.

ios.title: For iOS users:
ios.instructions: If you are using iOS <testflightLink>click this link to join WalkScape's TestFlight and download the game</testflightLink>.

profilePhoto.instructions: Crop and zoom/dezoom your profile picture here. You can use pinch-to-zoom on mobile devices.

singulars.subscriptionStateDisclaimer: Subscription state can take up to 1hr to refresh.

eligibleForNextWave.key_one: Eligible for next wave in approximately 1 to 2 weeks
eligibleForNextWave.key_other: Eligible for next wave in approximately {{ count }} to {{ countPlusOne }} weeks
